Apptivo is an API Key based integration and does not require the setup of an app. ​ Required Credentials of a Linked Account To successfully connect with the Apptivo integration, a Linked Account or an end-user will need to provide the following to connect: API Key Access Key To understand how a Linked Account can get the above mentioned credentials, refer below. ​ Getting Credentials of Apptivo CRM To acquire the required credentials and connect a Linked Account, please follow the steps mentioned below: Log in to your Apptivo CRM account . Click on the Profile icon in the top right and click on Business Settings . Click on API Access in the side menu and copy the API Key and Access Key displayed. The Linked Account or end-user now have all the credentials required to connect with Apptivo CRM. ​ Actions and triggers In Cobalt, you can create orchestrations of your use-cases using Apptivo actions and triggers. Following are the set of Apptivo actions and triggers supported by Cobalt. Actions Triggers Case Create Case - Create a new case in Apptivo. Update Case - Update a case in Apptivo. Delete Case - Delete a case in Apptivo. Contact Create Contact - Create a new Contact in Apptivo. Update Contact - Update a Contact in Apptivo. Delete Contact - Delete a Contact in Apptivo. Customer Create Customer - Create a new customer in Apptivo. Update Customer - Update a customer in Apptivo. Delete Customer - Delete a customer in Apptivo. Lead Create Lead - Create a new lead in Apptivo. Update Lead - Update a lead in Apptivo. Delete Lead - Delete a lead in Apptivo. Opportunity Create Opportunity - Create a new opportunity in Apptivo. Update Opportunity - Update a opportunity in Apptivo. Delete Opportunity - Delete a opportunity in Apptivo. Others HTTP Request - Make HTTP API calls to any Apptivo documented REST APIs.
